item.title: Evaluation Criteria
item.description: Competition evaluation will be kept as simple as possible. Submissions will be evaluated against two criteria: Creativity Applicability Below you will find a simple definition of each and some key questions to consider for your submission. Creativity For this competition, judges will be looking for imaginitive solutions that leverage original ideas either alone or in conjunction with existing free/open source tools. Some important questions to ask yourself:
